pullrequest.title: Slimmed down the Plugin pull request (no more template specializations)

content.raw:
I've added a few more commits to address reviewer feedback. The major changes are:

- `GetInterface` is now named `QueryInterface`
- `as_shared_ptr` is now named `QueryInterfaceSharedPtr`
- `QueryInterface` and `QueryInterfaceSharedPtr` documentation now goes into detail about the ownership semantics of interface pointers.

I'll merge this at the end of today unless anyone has an objection.
content.html:
I've added a few more commits to address reviewer feedback. The major changes are:

  • GetInterface is now named QueryInterface
  • as_shared_ptr is now named QueryInterfaceSharedPtr
  • QueryInterface and QueryInterfaceSharedPtr documentation now goes into detail about the ownership semantics of interface pointers.

I'll merge this at the end of today unless anyone has an objection.
